metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5290 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
A Denial of Service vulnerability exists in ircd-ratbox 3.0.9 in theMONITOR Command Handler.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5290` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

charybdis - 3.4.2-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: charybdis package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.4.2-3ubuntu0.1~esm1').
ircd-ratbox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
